description: gf.rejuice provides additional tools for developers to use Juicer for the compression of Javascript and CSS resources, in the context of python web applications that run via WSGI.

info.Keywords:: web middleware wsgi css js juicer merging minifying development

longdescription: gf.rejuice provides additional tools for developers to use Juicer for the compression of Javascript and CSS resources, in the context of python web applications that run via WSGI.
